pages.text: The Azalean race is a small plantlike race which has plantlike abilities.

$(l)Default Attribute modifiers:$()$(br)50% Size$(br)$(2)+20%$() Max Health$(br)$(4)-25%$() Attack Damage$(br)$(4)-25%$() Armor$(br)$(2)+1$() Luck$(br2)$(l)When near plants:$()$(br)$(2)+25%$() Attack Damage$(br)$(2)+25%$() Armor$(br)$(2)+25%$() Movement Speed
$(l)Ability: Photosynthesis$()$(br)Being in sunlight causes the azalean to slowly regenerate health.
